name: Jump or Die (flores productions)
description:
Title: Jump or Die

Platform- PC game

rating: E 10+

Description: the game is an endless runner and you must keep jumping on the platforms. if you fall off the platforms you will then die and you will have to restart the game. The goal is to rack up as much points possible to see how long you can last

instructions: Up button is to jump, space bar is to reset the game

Game design team\

Joshua Flores
